articles.title: Queensland Museum confirms discovery of Australia's largest dinosaur near outback Eromanga - ABC News
articles.description: Queensland Museum confirms Australotitan cooperensis, found during a cattle muster in outback Queensland, is the largest dinosaur ever discovered in Australia — and it's hoped there might be many more yet to be found.
articles.content:
